# arXiv & ar5iv Reference

> LLM-friendly documentation for arXiv API and ar5iv HTML papers

---

## Part 1: arXiv API

### API Endpoint

Base URL: `http://export.arxiv.org/api/query`

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|---------|-------------|
| search_query | string | - | Search terms with field prefixes |
| id_list | string | - | Comma-separated arXiv IDs |
| start | int | 0 | Result offset for pagination |
| max_results | int | 10 | Max results (1-2000) |
| sortBy | string | relevance | relevance / lastUpdatedDate / submittedDate |
| sortOrder | string | descending | ascending / descending |

### Search Field Prefixes

| Prefix | Field | Example |
|--------|-------|---------|
| `ti:` | Title | `ti:transformer` |
| `au:` | Author | `au:hinton` |
| `abs:` | Abstract | `abs:attention` |
| `cat:` | Category | `cat:cs.AI` |
| `co:` | Comment | `co:pages` |
| `jr:` | Journal Reference | `jr:nature` |
| `all:` | All fields | `all:neural+network` |

### Boolean Operators

**MUST be uppercase:**
- `AND` - Both terms required
- `OR` - Either term
- `ANDNOT` - First term but not second

### Example API Calls

```
# Search by title
http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?search_query=ti:transformer&max_results=10

# Search by author
http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?search_query=au:hinton&max_results=10

# Combined search
http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?search_query=ti:attention+AND+cat:cs.CL&max_results=10

# Get by ID
http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?id_list=2301.07041

# Sorted by date
http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?search_query=cat:cs.LG&sortBy=submittedDate&sortOrder=descending&max_results=20
```

### Response Format (Atom XML)

Key elements per `<entry>`:
- `<id>` - Paper URL
- `<title>` - Paper title
- `<summary>` - Abstract
- `<author><name>` - Author names
- `<published>` - Publication date
- `<arxiv:primary_category term="">` - Primary category

---

## Part 2: ar5iv.org HTML Papers

### Overview

ar5iv.org converts arXiv LaTeX papers to accessible HTML5.

### URL Patterns

| Purpose | URL |
|---------|-----|
| HTML paper | `https://ar5iv.org/html/{arxiv_id}` |
| Abstract page | `https://ar5iv.org/abs/{arxiv_id}` |

### HTML Structure & Selectors

#### Document Structure
```html
<article class="ltx_document">
  <div class="ltx_title">Paper Title</div>
  <div class="ltx_authors">Authors...</div>
  <div class="ltx_abstract">Abstract text...</div>

  <section id="S1" class="ltx_section">
    <h2 class="ltx_title">1 Introduction</h2>
    <div class="ltx_para">...</div>
  </section>

  <section id="S2" class="ltx_section">
    <h2 class="ltx_title">2 Methods</h2>
    ...
  </section>
</article>
```

#### Key Selectors

| Element | CSS Selector | Description |
|---------|--------------|-------------|
| Title | `.ltx_title` (first) | Paper title |
| Authors | `.ltx_authors` | Author list |
| Abstract | `.ltx_abstract` | Abstract content |
| All sections | `section.ltx_section` | Main sections |
| Section by ID | `#S1`, `#S2`, etc. | Specific section |
| Section title | `h2.ltx_title` | Section heading |
| Subsection | `section.ltx_subsection` | Subsections |
| Paragraphs | `.ltx_para` | Paragraph content |
| Figures | `figure.ltx_figure` | Figure containers |
| Figure image | `figure.ltx_figure img` | Figure images |
| Figure caption | `figcaption.ltx_caption` | Figure captions |
| Tables | `table.ltx_tabular` | Data tables |
| Equations | `.ltx_equation` | Math equations |
| Inline math | `.ltx_Math` | Inline math |
| Bibliography | `.ltx_bibliography` | Reference section |
| Single citation | `.ltx_bibitem` | Individual reference |
| Footnotes | `.ltx_note` | Footnote content |

#### Common Section IDs

| ID | Typical Content |
|----|-----------------|
| `#S1` | Introduction |
| `#S2` | Related Work / Background |
| `#S3` | Methods / Approach |
| `#S4` | Experiments / Results |
| `#S5` | Discussion |
| `#S6` | Conclusion |
| `#bib` | Bibliography |

### Extraction Examples

```
# Get paper title
agent-browser get text ".ltx_document > .ltx_title"

# Get abstract
agent-browser get text ".ltx_abstract"

# Get specific section (e.g., Methods)
agent-browser get text "#S3"

# Get all section titles (outline)
agent-browser get text "h2.ltx_title"

# Get all figure captions
agent-browser get text "figcaption.ltx_caption"

# Get bibliography
agent-browser get text ".ltx_bibliography"
```

### Availability Check

Not all arXiv papers have ar5iv versions. Check availability:
- Visit `https://ar5iv.org/abs/{id}`
- If page loads with content → HTML available
- If error page → No HTML version

---

## Part 3: URL Patterns Summary

| Purpose | URL |
|---------|-----|
| arXiv Abstract | `https://arxiv.org/abs/{id}` |
| arXiv PDF | `https://arxiv.org/pdf/{id}.pdf` |
| arXiv API by ID | `http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?id_list={id}` |
| arXiv API search | `http://export.arxiv.org/api/query?search_query={query}` |
| arXiv Latest | `https://arxiv.org/list/{category}/recent` |
| arXiv Advanced Search | `https://arxiv.org/search/advanced` |
| ar5iv HTML | `https://ar5iv.org/html/{id}` |
| ar5iv Abstract | `https://ar5iv.org/abs/{id}` |

## Part 4: arXiv ID Formats

| Format | Pattern | Example |
|--------|---------|---------|
| New (2007+) | YYMM.NNNNN | 2301.07041 |
| New with version | YYMM.NNNNNvN | 2301.07041v2 |
| Old | category/YYNNNNN | cs.AI/0612345 |

## Part 5: Common Categories

### Computer Science (cs.*)
- `cs.AI` - Artificial Intelligence
- `cs.CL` - Computation and Language (NLP)
- `cs.CV` - Computer Vision
- `cs.LG` - Machine Learning
- `cs.NE` - Neural and Evolutionary Computing
- `cs.RO` - Robotics
- `cs.SE` - Software Engineering

### Statistics (stat.*)
- `stat.ML` - Machine Learning

### Mathematics (math.*)
- `math.OC` - Optimization and Control

### Physics
- `quant-ph` - Quantum Physics
- `cond-mat.stat-mech` - Statistical Mechanics

---

## Part 6: Rate Limiting

- arXiv API: 3 second delay between requests
- ar5iv.org: Respect server load, avoid rapid requests
- Be respectful of free academic services
